nodes.text: Galvas were a species of mammals native to the equatorial deserts of Saleucami.

Diminutive and innocuous, the galva was a herd animal that moved across the hot equatorial regions of Saleucami. Feeding off of desert lichens and moss, galva rarely drank water, relying on their food to maintain hydration. Prized for their skins, galva herds had been depleted by the time of the Galactic Civil War due to overhunting.
